title: Telegraph Audio Football Club podcast: Are we overreacting to England's Euro 2020 qualifying loss?
text:
On the podcast today, we ask whether England are slipping back into their old ways and suffering something of an identity crisis.

Elsewhere, Wales get some decent results to keep hopes of qualifying for Euro 2020 alive, Scotland play the wettest game of football we’ve ever witnessed and the Republic of Ireland top their group.

Plus a Premier League preview, a European round-up and when is it best to sack a manager.

Subscribe to Audio Football Club to make sure you never miss an episode and email us at afcpodcast@telegraph.co.uk

Sign up to free twice-daily WhatsApp audio briefings: http://bit.ly/2XJU05f
description: On the podcast today, we ask whether England are slipping back into their old ways and suffering something of an identity crisis.
